title: Port label and labels commands to Cobra
description: Migrate label (manage tick labels) and labels (list all labels) commands to Cobra subcommands.
closed_reason: Created cmd/tk/cmd/label.go with subcommands (add, rm, list) and cmd/tk/cmd/labels.go with --json flag. Added label and labels to Cobra routing in main.go. Follows established pattern from other Cobra migrations.
